meanings.definition: The entrails and internal organs of an animal used as food.
meanings.sent1: The chef prepared a delicious stew using the offals of the pig.
meanings.sent2: The farmer sold the offals of the cow to the local butcher.
meanings.sent3: The offals were the unexpected star of the dinner party, much to everyone's surprise.
meanings.sent4: The offals of the chicken were like hidden treasures waiting to be discovered.
meanings.sent5: The offals added a unique flavor to the dish, making it unforgettable.

meanings.definition: Waste or byproducts, especially of a butchered animal.
meanings.sent1: The butcher disposed of the offals in a designated area behind the shop.
meanings.sent2: The offals from the slaughterhouse were collected for recycling purposes.
meanings.sent3: The offals piled up in the corner, creating a rather unpleasant sight.
meanings.sent4: The offals served as a reminder of the cycle of life and death in nature.
meanings.sent5: The smell of the offals lingered in the air, attracting scavengers from afar.
